text_block_list.text: As I napped I saw a dream of the past…
As I was heading home from an amusement park I saw a young girl crying because she had lost her mother.
Really…!? Thank you, Onee-chan! Ehehe, you're such a nice person ♪
Really…!? Thank you, Onee-chan! Ehehe, you're such a nice person ♪
She stopped crying while we looked for her mother. And as soon as we got to the front of a castle attraction she stopped and stared at it.
choice_data_list: Do you want to be a princess?

text_block_list.text: She stared at it so intently that I had to ask. And when I did she smiled at me in an unexpectedly mature manner…
Well, my dream is to become…
One morning as I stood in front of Tracen Academy, I noticed a crowd of unusually dazzling individuals.

text_block_list.name: Stylish Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Hey, isn't this like the best spot!? I told you it was hella close!!

text_block_list.name: Bandwagon Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: It was super worth getting up early to get this spot!! If I'm lucky, I might get to take a selfie with her…
choice_data_list: So uh… What's going on here?

text_block_list.name: Stylish Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Eh!? You haven't heard, Trainer-san!? Today's the day that the famous Umastagrammer "Curren" is transferring to this academy!!

text_block_list.name: Bandwagon Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Hold on! You haven't heard of THE Selfie Goddess herself!? The one who despite all the competition managed to get 3 million followers on Umastagram! You haven't heard of THAT Curren!?
It seems like they're excited because an idol of sorts is transferring here.  I stuck around, out of curiousity…
A limousine stopped in front of the school gates and a young girl stepped out…!

text_block_list.name: Fans
text_block_list.text: Kyaa!! Curren!!
Waa ♪ Everyone seems so happy to see me! Were you waiting for me this whole time!?
Ehehe, I didn't expect to be welcomed like this…

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Everyone, I'm so glad you're here ♪ Hehe ♪

text_block_list.name: Stylish Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: You're kidding…! Curren only uses a filter on her background!?

text_block_list.name: Stylish Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Her aura is so bright…!! She's definitely the real deal, the real Umasta Curren…!

text_block_list.name: Bandwagon Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Umm… W-Would it be okay if I took a selfie with you…!? I-I'm y-your biggest fan!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Of course it's okay! Hmm… I know, we'd look super cute posing like this!

text_block_list.name: Bandwagon Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Woah, this is like a once in a lifetime shot… God, thank you for this blessing…!!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Just getting to see everyone happy makes me super happy ♪ But don't forget, if you're gonna upload it add #CurrenChan, okay?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Everyone, feel free to take as many pictures as you'd like ☆ And make sure to send them to anyone that doesn't know who I am ♪

text_block_list.name: Fans
text_block_list.text: Okay ♪
Such incredible leadership… I couldn't help but stare… and that's when our eyes met.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Wait… You're…!!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: You're that super nice person!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: And my… soulmate!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: You're a trainer at this academy, aren't you? I've been… looking everywhere for you!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: I've decided! From now on… you're gonna be my trainer ♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Is that a no…? And here I thought you'd at least hear me out… *whimpers*…
I was nearly engulfed by her cute aura… But I managed to grab hold of my senses. Signing on as someone's trainer is not something to be taken lightly.
choice_data_list: C-Could you come here for a second?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Of course ♪
We went a short distance from the gates as I told her about the importance of a trainer  and to not make such a decision solely on a whim.
choice_data_list: You have your own dreams, right?
You have your own dreams, right?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Dreams… huh?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Well of course I do ♪ But the real reason I came to this academy is…

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: To get more people to call me cute ♪ You see, I figured that if I attended Tracen Academy I'd get much more attention!
Her words struck me like a hammer to the head. Is that really the reason she came here…!?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Anyway… in order for me to shine brighter than ever, I can't have anyone but you!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: I'm begging you… Onee-chan!! Please be my trainer ♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: I'm begging you… Onee-chan!! Please be my trainer ♪

text_block_list.name: Stylish Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Is that person really gonna say no to THE Curren even though she's begging them…?

text_block_list.name: Bandwagon Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: I mean, if they're not training anyone they could at least hear her out, ya know?
Her fans' piercing stares made me hesitate, and when I did…

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: So from now on you're my trainer! I'm glad that's finally settled ♪
Before I knew it, I was signing on as her trainer…! What a brilliantly executed plan… She's definitely not your average person.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Yay♪ So from now on we're gonna spend every day together!  I'm looking forward to this, Onee-chan♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Yay♪ So from now on we're gonna spend every day together!  I'm looking forward to this, Onee-chan♪

text_block_list.name: Fans
text_block_list.text: Curren, congratulations!!
There was a round of applause… But mixed in with it were voices of displeasure.

text_block_list.name: Serious Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: What's all the fuss about…?

text_block_list.name: Race-loving Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Umastagrammer and what not… Students here are meant to be serious about racing, you know?
I guess standing out really does invite more criticism. And here, the best way to respond is to let your racing do the talking.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Onee-chan… Could it be? Are you worried about me?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Onee-chan… Could it be? Are you worried about me?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Hehe, don't worry. Because you see… I'm super cute♪
The following day was a fitness exam. Curious onlookers watched as Curren Chan showed exactly what she's made of.

text_block_list.name: Instructor
text_block_list.text: Th-This time on a 1200 meter dirt track…!?
The onlookers began muttering amongst themselves. Her time was absolutely unthinkable for a rookie! She seems like a natural-born sprinter.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Onee-chan! Hey, how did I do? I bet I looked super cute out there ♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Onee-chan! Hey, how did I do? I bet I looked super cute out there ♪
Curren Chan, what exactly is your aim? Well, for now I guess I'll follow her on Umastagram…
